description:
Learn how to build your very own mortgage free, environmentally sustainable home.

In Part 3 of How to Build a Tiny House, I cover:

Installing the Electrical. In these lectures you’ll learn how to wire a tiny house. Including more advanced concepts like wiring for 3-way switches.

Installing the Plumbing. In these lectures you’ll learn what material to use as well as how all the plumbing components fit together to supply water to the various parts of a tiny house.

Insulation. In these lectures you’ll learn about the different insulation types and the pros and cons of each. I also show how to install insulation so that it acts as both an air and vapor barrier.

Installing Flooring and Interior Siding. In these lectures you’ll learn how to install the interior siding and flooring. You’ll also learn how to do it so that they will last and not buckle.
title: How to Build a Tiny House - Part 3
